items.item: Grid Arched 2-Tier Basket Server Bowls for Storage
description: Organization and Display of Produce Vegetables and Fruit STURDY DESIGN: Made from sturdy steel, this fruit and produce server is durable and made to last, organizing your dining room, kitchen or countertop for years to come
STORAGE SOLVED: No longer worry about having enough room in the fridge for your vegetables, fruit, or produce
With the Grid Arched 2-Tier Server, allow your fruit to ripen naturally and evenly
EFFECTIVE AND RELIABLE: This storage fruit basket is effective at clearing counter and fridge space in the kitchen
No additional description provided in the invoice.
